channel.title: How do i fix these?
channel.description:
[size=20pt]I HAVE PIMPSCAPE SERVER SOURCE[/size]
Whenever I attack someone, its not how it should look. I mean it shows me hit them with the weapon about 5 times really fast and on the 6th time i hit them and they lose hp. How do i fix it so it shows me hit them once and they lose hp. Also I would like help on fixing armored gloves on pimpscape. Also when i wear some items you can see the color of my body feature like u can see most of the infinity top but some u can see thru it to my shirt which is black, how can i make it so u can see the whole item? Please post code here, thanks. any help?

item.title: How do i fix these?
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

For the shirt parts, simply go into item.java and place the ID code of the buggy shirt or whatever it is in the appropriate section.

If the ID of a buggy shirt is 636 for example

then place it in the INT body[] section, with the rest of the ID codes, seperated by a comma. If that doesn’t work then you would try another section that also uses the Top Body equip location. Such as the Int Platebody[] section. Eitherway one should work.

The other one is a thing relating to timers and abs locations. I’m not sure how to fix it right now as I’m tired and about to go to sleep.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i fix these?
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

For the first part mess around with the action timer a little bit. For the second part you need to put the infinity top ID under body in item.java

Read full topic
